org.restlet.engine.util
クラス Base64

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.engine.util.Base64

public class Base64
extends java.lang.Object

Minimal but fast Base64 codec.

作成者:
Ray Waldin (ray@waldin.net)

コンストラクタの概要
Base64()
           
 
メソッドの概要
static byte[] decode(char[] chars)
          Decodes base64 characters into bytes.
static byte[] decode(java.lang.String encodedString)
          Decodes a base64 string into bytes.
static java.lang.String encode(byte[] bytes, boolean newlines)
          Encodes an entire byte array into a Base64 string, with optional newlines after every 76 characters.
static java.lang.String encode(byte[] bytes, int off, int len, boolean newlines)
          Encodes specified bytes into a Base64 string, with optional newlines after every 76 characters.
static java.lang.String encode(char[] chars, boolean newlines)
          Encodes an entire chars array into a Base64 string, with optional newlines after every 76 characters.

          Encodes an entire chars array into a Base64 string, with optional newlines after every 76 characters.

          Converts a char array into a byte array using the default character set.

          Converts a char array into a byte array using the provided character set.

メソッドの詳細

decode

public static byte[] decode(char[] chars)
Decodes base64 characters into bytes. Newline characters found at block boundaries will be ignored.

パラメータ:
chars - The characters array to decode.
戻り値:
The decoded byte array.

decode

public static byte[] decode(java.lang.String encodedString)
Decodes a base64 string into bytes. Newline characters found at block boundaries will be ignored.

パラメータ:
encodedString - The string to decode.
戻り値:
The decoded byte array.

encode

public static java.lang.String encode(byte[] bytes,
                                      boolean newlines)
Encodes an entire byte array into a Base64 string, with optional newlines after every 76 characters.

パラメータ:
bytes - The byte array to encode.
newlines - Indicates whether or not newlines are desired.
戻り値:
The encoded string.

encode

public static java.lang.String encode(byte[] bytes,
                                      int off,
                                      int len,
                                      boolean newlines)
Encodes specified bytes into a Base64 string, with optional newlines after every 76 characters.

パラメータ:
bytes - The byte array to encode.
off - The starting offset.
len - The number of bytes to encode.
newlines - Indicates whether or not newlines are desired.
戻り値:
The encoded string.

encode

public static java.lang.String encode(char[] chars,
                                      boolean newlines)
Encodes an entire chars array into a Base64 string, with optional newlines after every 76 characters.

パラメータ:
chars - The characters array to encode.
newlines - Indicates whether or not newlines are desired.
戻り値:
The encoded string.

encode

public static java.lang.String encode(char[] chars,
                                      java.lang.String charset,
                                      boolean newlines)
Encodes an entire chars array into a Base64 string, with optional newlines after every 76 characters.

パラメータ:
chars - The characters array to encode.
charset - The character set to use for the character to byte conversion.
newlines - Indicates whether or not newlines are desired.
戻り値:
The encoded string.

toByteArray

public static byte[] toByteArray(char[] chars)
Converts a char array into a byte array using the default character set.

パラメータ:
chars - The source characters.
戻り値:
The result bytes.

toByteArray

public static byte[] toByteArray(char[] chars,
                                 java.lang.String charsetName)
Converts a char array into a byte array using the provided character set.

パラメータ:
chars - The source characters.
charsetName - The character set to use.
戻り値:
The result bytes.
